title: Science and Technology Policy
overview: This course provides students with knowledge about the theory and practice of science and technology policy. It covers the process of building, critiquing, implementing, monitoring, and evaluating science and technology policies in the context of Vietnam with global integration and competition.

sub_domains: Interrelationship between science, technology, and socio-economic development
Objectives, roles, principles, and management tools for science & technology
Analysis and evaluation of science & technology policies

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to evaluate science and technology policies in organizational practices under different scenarios, apply tools for policy analysis, and plan, implement, and evaluate R&D policies.
Students will be able to effectively present and work in teams.
